section.class: s_cover parallax s_parallax_is_fixed bg-black-50 o_colored_level pb256 pt232

i.class: fa fa-glass fa-5x text-o-color-3 mx-auto my-4

div.p: Our professional yet convivial service will make your supply experience unforgettable.

i.class: fa fa-shopping-basket fa-2x rounded-circle bg-primary m-3
fa fa-gift fa-2x rounded-circle bg-400 m-3
fa fa-truck bg-secondary m-3 rounded-circle fa-2x

section.class: s_numbers o_cc o_cc5 pt80 pb80 o_colored_level

p.font: Thanks to our new wine specialist, we are now proud to propose more than 100 different wines in our stock.

img.class: figure-img img-fluid img-thumbnail padding-large img o_we_custom_image

figure.figcaption: Visit us to get a free degustation for B2B partners !

div.p: A wide selection of beverages with local products. We’re constantly looking to propose new drinks and flavors. While respecting seasons' products and nature.

At the Bistro, you can expect a wide selection of beverages to accompany your meal. Come and visit us for a Sunday brunch, refreshing juices full of flavor, or delicious cocktails that satisfy your thirst. And each day, you’ll discover our Today’s Special.

i.class: fa fa-1x fa-quote-left rounded float-start bg-o-color-2 s_blockquote_icon

div.p: Cosy and friendly, good atmosphere and super drinks. Especially the homemade lemonade.
div.footer: Jane SMITH • CEO of Beverage Co.

i.class: fa fa-1x fa-quote-left rounded float-start bg-o-color-2 s_blockquote_icon

div.p: This place is perfect for groups or a casual date night.
div.footer: John SMITH • CEO of Beverage Co.

i.class: fa fa-1x fa-quote-left rounded float-start bg-o-color-2 s_blockquote_icon

div.p: A truly exquisite drinking experience. I highly recommend the Margarita, out of this world.
div.footer: Iris SMITH • CEO of Beverage Co.

section.class: s_title parallax s_parallax_is_fixed bg-black-50 pt24 pb24

div.p: Adapt these three columns to fit your design need. To duplicate, delete or move columns, select the column and use the top icons to perform your action.
To add a fourth column, reduce the size of these three columns using the right icon of each block. Then, duplicate one of the columns to create a new one as a copy.
Delete the above image or replace it with a picture that showcases our products. Click on the picture to change its rounded corner style.

div.class: offcanvas-body d-flex justify-content-between flex-grow-0 border-top overflow-hidden

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-{{navClass}} d-flex py-1 mb-2 {{(not attrib_values and not isFilteringByPrice and not tags) and 'disabled' }}
a.t-att-aria-disabled: (not attrib_values and not isFilteringByPrice and not tags) and 'true' or 'false'

p.em: Add the description of this dish here.

data.xpath: Cosy and friendly, good atmosphere and super food. Especially the spiced fruit crumble.
This place is perfect for groups or a casual date night.
A truly exquisite dining experience. I highly recommend the Mustard Sauce, out of this world.
